agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Article III TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM, Monday, February 25, 2019 PLACE: E1.030 CHAIR: Rep. Greg Bonnen The Appropriations Subcommittee on Article III will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget recommendations. The Subcommittee will discuss both public education and higher education. As a reminder, no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting.
